column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
well i i take over the medicine
It's important to take any medication only if prescribed by a doctor. Please tell me more about what symptoms you have and why you think you need to take this medication.
will AI take over the medicine

AI is not able to prescribe medication for medical conditions, as this is best determined by a doctor or medical professional. However, AI can be used to help inform decision making on treatments and suggestions for managing certain conditions.
